div.l: He myght don vs bath · a vilanye
Alayn aunswerd · I counte hym nat a flye
And he vp rist · and bi the wenche in crept
This wenche lay vpright · and fast slept
That he so ny was · or she cowde espie
That it was to late · for to crye
And shortly for to sayn · they were atoon
Now pley Alayn · for I wil speke of Iohn
This Iohn lay stille · a furlong wey or two
And to hym self · he makith sorow and woo
Alas quod he this is a wikked Iape
Now may I sey · that I is but anape
Yit hath my felaw · som what for his harmarmharm
He hath the Millers doughter · in his arm
He auntred hym · and hath his neodis sped
And I lye as a drafsek in my bed
And whan this Iape is told · another day
I shalbe hold a daffe · and a cokenay
I wil arise · and aunter be my faith
Vnhardy is vncely · thus men saith
And vp he Rose · and softly he went
Vnto the cradil · and in his hand it hent
And bare it softe · vnto his beddis feete
Soone after this · the wif hir rowtyng leete
And gan a wake · and wente hir oute to pisse
And cam agayn · and gan hir cradil mysse
And gropid here and ther · but she fond non
Allas quod she · I had almost mysgon
I had almost gon · to the clerkis bed
